WorkItem.Description:
I have the problem with the application. I need to be able to access site http://www.sitename.com,

but it's always redirect to http://sitename.com. I have checked all settings (set root url to www.sitename.com) and couldn't find anything that could effect it.

any idea where I can change it?
WorkItem.Summary: Cannot set url to use www
